channel.title: suryansh.xyz Articles
channel.description: Articles related to Machine Learning, Blockchain/Cryptocurrency, Linux and most things tech by Suryansh S.

item.title: Neural Networks: All You Need to Know
item.description: The backbone of any large scale ML project starts with a Network… A Neural Network and Here’s all you need to know about them.

item.title: Genetic Algorithms + Neural Networks = Best of Both Worlds
item.description: Neural Networks coupled with Genetic Algorithms can really accelerate the learning process to solve a certain problem.

item.title: Gradient Descent: All You Need to Know
item.description: Gradient Descent is the most used learning algorithm in Machine Learning and this post will show you almost everything you need to know about it.

item.title: Don't know these Machine Learning Resources? You’re missing out!
item.description: The resources you need to get started with machine learning.
